creator: josh41

title: Thought I was Clicking the old Get Messages Spot, but Apparently It Has Disappeared, Along with File Edit View etc tabs
content:
For several months, I think, Thunderbird on my PC was failing to receive any of my emails that people, including myself, sent to my mailfence.com email address. The emails to my mailfence.com email address came into my *iphone* just fine; just not into Thunderbird, which is on my PC. They used to come in fine into my PC's Thunderbird app for the last few years.

Turns out, I THINK, the culprit was that I had *thought* I was clicking the old "Get Messages" button, but that button WASN'T EVEN AT THAT SPOT anymore! Instead, I was mistakenly clicking the "Mail" icon, thinking it was the "Get Messages" icon, or at least that it was serving the same purpose as the old Get Messages icon used to give me.

Somehow I just now saw a bunch of emails to my mailfence.com email address come into Thunderbird, from my recent various experiments. Not sure how I did that; maybe clicking the "Mail" icon does in fact serve as a "Get Messages" icon?

Get a load of the attached screengrab, and you'll see my confusion: (1) There is no longer a "Get Messages" button at the upper left. (2) AND, there's no File Edit View bar of tabs at the very top like there used to be! The File Home View you see in this screengrab is from the PAINT app, I believe. I realized this problem by looking up in Thunderbird Support how to get "Get Messages" back and saw a screengrab that had File Edit View, that I then realized I was missing.

Thanks for any help getting me back my File Edit View and my Get Messages button. If you see other problems in this figure please I'd appreciate your letting me know how to fix that, too!
creator: alysenet1

title: TB will not send or receive emails with my pktriot.net site link
content: TB will not send or receive emails with my pktriot.net site link, but sends any other URL link. I want to have someone preview my wordpress site and i created a Packetriot account to do so online. I have found that my pktriot.net links are never received. Further, if I send the pktriot.net link from my Gmail account to my TB email, I never receive it, but if I send the same link to another gmail account it goes through just fine. If I send the link as a "pktriot dot net" it will go to my TB email account, but clients do not want to manipulate an email to view the site. As stated previously, any other URL to any other site works fine, ONLY my pktriot.net link fails to send or be received. Am I missing something here? Thank you for any help you may have to offer.
creator: avanti333

title: thunderbirdの受信はできているが、メールが送信できない件
content:
お世話になっております。 thunderbirdを使用しております。

この度、数日前より新しいPCに移行してから、 受信はできますがメールの送信ができません。 エラーメッセージは下記の通りでございます。

改善方法をご教示いただけますと幸いです。何卒よろしくお願いいたします。

メッセージを送信できませんでした。 送信 (SMTP) サーバー ************との接続がタイムアウトしたため、メッセージを送信できませんでした。再度試してください。
creator: kiyomi.k

title: Hotmail email account on Thunderbird worked last night, but today I cannot send emails.
content:
I was sending emails just fine last night, I can send them fine from the web browser, and I can do it fine from mail app on my phone. But when I try to send it from Thunderbird, I get an ongoing error with the following:

Login to server smtp.office365.com with user name my email address failed.

I have already checked the settings, and I changed and re-entered the new password in Thunderbird, and while I can still receive emails I cannot send them.

Here's an exact image of the settings I put, minus my blacked out email address.

I've tried two different email addresses to send to, including a test email to my own address, so I'm at a loss what to do. Have also closed, and restarted Thunderbird, and my whole PC.

I am receiving emails just fine, and I changed nothing before this error started, I double checked everything, even my email address, and copied my outgoing email address name to my online mailbox and sent myself a test email just to be 100% certain it's correct.
creator: firstborndragon

title: Outlook accounts failing signin
content: Been using Thunderbird for years with these accounts. Just today outlook accounts failing to login. Accounts do not receive email. Can not send email. Checked server settings, which were unchanged and obviously worked previously. Tried deleting passwords in password manager and re-entry. Failed. What's up with the outlook connnection?
creator: nuked9

title: composing a new message
content: When composing a new message, I was able to click in the blank to box (To: and Cc:) and get a choice of previous entries. How can I turn that back on?
creator: egan2

title: Threaded view does not respect date order
content:
I have a problem with the threaded view in Thunderbird. Even though I set the sorting to “by date” with newest messages on top, the conversation view does not follow this order.

As you can see in the attached screenshot, the newest message sometimes appears in the middle of the thread, and the order of the replies looks random, as if Thunderbird is “inventing” the sequence instead of respecting the actual message dates.

This makes it very confusing to follow conversations, because the chronological flow is broken.

Is this a known bug in Thunderbird 140, or is there an additional configuration I need to adjust so that threaded conversations always show the most recent message at the top in correct order?

I have 143.0.1 (64-bit)

Thank you for your help.
creator: sergio1

title: I have Thunderbird on two computers. Both can receive emails but not send. Both ask me to resend my outlook password which I do but it tells me authentiacation failed. Any ideas?
content: I have Thunderbird on 2 computers and both can receive emails but not send them. One is brand new. When I send an email I am asked for my password for my outlook account but when I send it I get the message that authentication did not occur. Any ideas?

title: Task-Management for multiple gmail-task-calendars
content: When moving a task from "meine Aufgaben" (my tasks) to another Gmail calendar tasklist ("AI"), a ghost entry, which cannot be completed or deleted, remains in the old Thunderbird tasklist "meine Aufgaben". Thus I have many tasks twice in different Thunderbird-calendars, but only once in Gmail.
creator: rainer.haselberger

title: Temporary Change of SMTP - can it be done?
content:
Is it possible to temporarily change the outgoing SMTP server at time of sending an email? I have a problem sending to one person on my contact list (who has an AOL email address).

As a workaround I can go into my Thunderbird Account Setting and change the Outgoing SMTP servers, send to the AOL addressee, then reset the Outgoing SMTP servers to their original setting. I wondered if there was any option withing the New Message creation to temporarily select an alternative SMTP server to use for that email only?

The background is:- - Many years ago some ISPs (mainly BT.com) rejected emails sent via the servers of my email hosting company. - In order to get around this I started using Gmail outgoing servers, with my Gmail settings masking the Gmail ID so that any recipients saw emails as from MYNAME@MYDOMAIN.COM. This has worked perfectly for many years (probably 10+ years). - Very recently I have a new contact with an AOL.COM email address, and AOL is blocking my emails to him and sending me a rejection notice with references to DKIM & SPF failures (to be honest that means nothing to me and is beyond my technical know-how). - Ironically I found by trial and error that if I change my Thunderbird Outgoing Server to my own ISP Servers then AOL accepts my emails. I would like this to be a little bit simpler as I cannot get AOL to give me any useful suggestions.

Many thanks for any ideas.
creator: redhouse

Diesen Sachverhalt habe ich bereits mit dem Discord-Support verfolgt und bin noch zu keiner Lösung gekommen. Auch das Einfügen der Adressen von Discord in die Whitelist hat nicht geholfen.
creator: jsonntag118

title: Send toolbar disappeared
content:
I got this answer to my problem:

The Send bar has disappeared KAMI 30 sep. 2025 19:35:12 Hi, to customize the toolbar in Thunderbird: Right-click on an empty space next to the Search bar in the toolbar. Select Customize… (Toolbar) from the context menu. A window will appear showing all available buttons and the current toolbar layout. You can drag and drop buttons to add, remove, or rearrange them. When you’re done, click Done to save your changes. This is the quickest way to restore missing buttons like Send, Attach, or any other tools you use frequently.

Unfortunately, the bottons like Send and Attach are not available here in my application!
creator: bengt.so46

title: Emails being sent unknown to me, not in Sent folder
content:
Hi all,

I have an issue whereby emails are being sent to my clients repeatedly, without me sending them. This happens daily in the morning, and is incredibly frustrating and difficult to diagnose as the emails do not show in the Sent folder.

Clients reply on the email stating they receive the email/invoice every day. I can't contact clients to let them know to disregard the email, as I do not know who is affected. The only temporary fix I have found is removing their email address from my address book.

I have inspected the replied email, and I do not see anything out of the ordinary like changes in bank details, so it does not look like a email spoofing. I am wondering if this is not an issue with Thunderbird on my windows PC.

I am going to uninstall and reinstall Thunderbird tonight and try and monitor if this fixes the issue, but this will take a few days and I have tried everything (including changing password and turning on 2FA).

I have asked for and am waiting for an email as an attachment, to attempt to inspect headers.

Any advice or guidelines would be sincerely appreciated. Matthew

{Edited to improve readability via line wrap.}
creator: boeboebishop

title: AIO solution for multiple email IMAP servers +AIO solution for multiple email IMAP servers + backups: Could Thunderbird handle this?
content:
HI! I was wondering: is there a way to bring together email backups, different formats, different applications, and multiple user accounts into a single piece of software?

Currently:

For backups: Thunderbird, MailStore, and some manual exports in mbox format.

For daily use: Outlook and the provider’s WebApp.

The idea would be to have a single application that allows you to:

manage backups,

simultaneously consult the 5 active accounts,

distinguish between the online part (all IMAP mail servers used daily) and the offline part (backups saved on a physical disk within the local network, well-organized by account and backup date, accessible from all Windows PCs connected to the network and with access to that disk).

This software would be used simultaneously on multiple PCs.

A key aspect is that local backups should automatically empty the online servers, freeing up space without manual intervention.

In short, the software should also autonomously handle the scheduled emptying of IMAP mailboxes. backups?
creator: lillettoventus

title: Can I scroll through a complete conversation content just like in gmail? (and preferably with the double content replaced by .. :-))
content: Hello, I am in the Old fashion table view style and have conversations enabled, so that I can see which e-mails belong together. My question is: Is it also possible to scoll through the complete content of a conversation with one key press, preferably where the double content is replaced by ..; everything just like in gmail? At this moment you have to open alle e-mails one by one. I know you can get a view with the heads of the e-mails, but I want to read easily through the content. Thank you!!
creator: r.vanderspank

title: Thunderbird
content: In an email which includes previous emails the first email displays correctly, in the second the line length is shorter. In each earlier email the line length gets shorter until after five or six emails there is only one character per line. This also happens with K-9 mail client.
creator: johnmhughes
